string-array.name: tips
string-array.item: "Get bus schedules anytime, anywhere! All schedules are available instantly without using your network connection at all (off-line mode)! You will love this feature if you get no network coverage :)"
"Click on the magnifying glass icon on the top right corner of the screen to start searching for a bus line, station or city."
"While searching, you can use the voice recognition feature when the microphone icon is available."
"Click on the star icon next to any bus station's name to add it to your bookmarks available on the home page."
"If you don't want to display any map at all, you can disable the map-based service on the settings page."
